  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, SelectionListener, EventListener, GameDataListener
    public class BasicRegionPanel
extends InternationalizedDataPanel
implements SelectionListener
    A GUI component displaying very basic data about regions.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
